azureResourceGraph.query:
Resources
| where subscriptionId =~ '$sub'
| where resourceGroup =~ '$rg'
| where type =~ '$ns'
| where name =~ '$AppName'
| extend containers = todynamic(properties.template.containers)
| mv-expand containers
| summarize cpu = strcat(sum(todouble(containers.resources.cpu)) * 1000, " m cores")

Resources
| where subscriptionId =~ '$sub'
| where resourceGroup =~ '$rg'
| where type =~ '$ns'
| where name =~ '$AppName'
| extend containers = todynamic(properties.template.containers)
| mv-expand containers
| summarize memory = strcat(
      sum(
        todouble(substring(containers.resources.memory, 0, strlen(containers.resources.memory) - 2)) 
        * 1000
      ), 
    " MB")

Server Request Count - By App Role Name - $FullCustomerInstanceName

panels.description: Percentage of processed messages to missed cache
panels.title: Percentage of cache miss to processed messages

azureResourceGraph.query:
resources
| where type == 'microsoft.insights/components' and name == "$AppInsightsInstance"
| project appInsightsName = name, subscriptionId, aiResourceGroup = resourceGroup
| join kind=inner (
    resourcecontainers
    | where type == 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'
    | project subscriptionId, subscriptionName = name)
    on subscriptionId
        | where subscriptionName startswith "dev" or subscriptionName startswith "prd"
        | distinct subscriptionId, subscriptionName, appInsightsName, aiResourceGroup
| project aiResourceGroup

resources
| where type == 'microsoft.insights/components' and name == "$AppInsightsInstance"
| project appInsightsName = name, subscriptionId
| join kind=inner (
    resourcecontainers
    | where type == 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'
    | project subscriptionId, subscriptionName = name)
    on subscriptionId
        | where subscriptionName startswith "dev" or subscriptionName startswith "prd"
        | distinct subscriptionId, subscriptionName, appInsightsName
| project subscriptionId

resources
| where type == 'microsoft.insights/components' and name == "$AppInsightsInstance"
| project appInsightsName = name, subscriptionId, location
| join kind=inner (
    resourcecontainers
    | where type == 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'
    | project subscriptionId, subscriptionName = name)
    on subscriptionId
        | where subscriptionName startswith "dev" or subscriptionName startswith "prd"
        | distinct subscriptionId, subscriptionName, appInsightsName, location
| project location

azureLogAnalytics.query:
let cae = '$ContainerEnvironment';
print cae
| extend SplitValues = split(cae, "-")
| extend Region = tostring(SplitValues[2])
| extend Environment = tostring(SplitValues[1])
| extend AppInsightsInstance = strcat_delim("-", "ain", Environment, Region)
| project AppInsightsInstance

let cae = '$ContainerEnvironment';
print cae
| extend SplitValues = split(cae, "-")
| extend Region = tostring(SplitValues[2])
| extend Environment = tostring(SplitValues[1])
| extend Stamp = tostring(SplitValues[3])
| extend CustomerInstance = strcat_delim("-", tostring(SplitValues[4]), tostring(SplitValues[5]))
| extend Fcin = strcat_delim(":", Environment, Region, Stamp, CustomerInstance)
| project Fcin

resources
| where type == 'microsoft.app/managedenvironments' and name == "$ContainerEnvironment"
| project id

azureResourceGraph.query:
resources
| where type == 'microsoft.app/managedenvironments' and name == "$ContainerEnvironment"
| project id

resources
| where type == 'microsoft.app/managedenvironments' and name !contains "dummy"
| project ceName = name, subscriptionId
| join kind=inner (
    resourcecontainers
    | where type == 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'
    | project subscriptionId, subscriptionName = name)
    on subscriptionId
        | where subscriptionName startswith "dev" or subscriptionName startswith "prd"
        | distinct subscriptionId, subscriptionName, ceName
| project ceName

list.name: AppName
list.query: cognian-telemetry-adapter, command-and-control-web, connector-reliability-monitor, connectorcore, connectorxl, edge-deployment-dashboard, edge-deployment-db-sync-service, edge-deployment-service, edge-metrics-processor, iothub-telemetry-adaptor, livedatacore, mapped-telemetry-adaptor, telemetry-streaming

azureResourceGraph.query:
resources
| where type == 'microsoft.eventhub/namespaces'
| where resourceGroup == '$rg'
| project ehName = name, subscriptionId
| join kind=inner (
    resourcecontainers
    | where type == 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'
    | project subscriptionId, subscriptionName = name)
    on subscriptionId
        | where subscriptionName startswith "dev" or subscriptionName startswith "prd"
        | distinct subscriptionId, subscriptionName, ehName
| project ehName
